titles.title: International Partnership for Reconciliation in Iraq Act of 2008
To establish a fund to support international efforts for political reconciliation in Iraq, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2831-2832)
Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
4/29/2008--Introduced.
International Partnership for Reconciliation in Iraq Act of 2008 - Expresses the sense of Congress supporting reconciliation efforts within Iraq and the creation of an Iraqi-supported international commitment to reconciliation in Iraq. Authorizes the United States Institute of Peace to provide assistance to support international efforts to encourage peaceful and positive contact, dialogue, and reconciliation among the Iraqi people.
